paramDescriptions.label: Loop
paramDescriptions.description: Restart from beginning when sequence completes.

paramDescriptions.label: Steps
paramDescriptions.description: Array of { time, action: { type, params }, delay?, randomDelay?, repeat? }. Actions: ModifyStatistic, SpawnFromPool, FireProjectile, SendComponentMessage, SetVisible, EmitEvent, etc.

paramDescriptions.label: Trigger Events
paramDescriptions.description: Event names that start playback when emitted.

paramDescriptions.label: Phase
paramDescriptions.description: Game loop phase to run the sequencer.

paramDescriptions.label: On Complete
paramDescriptions.description: Event name or action config when sequence completes (non-loop).
